import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Note } from '../note'; import { Story } from './story'; import { StoryService } from './story.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-story', templateUrl: './story.component.html', styleUrls: ['./story.component.css'] }) export class StoryComponent implements OnInit{ notes: Story[] = []; constructor(private storyService: StoryService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.storyService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.notes = data; }) } }
